product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mesa V2 Shorts - Men's
long_description: Pack light and travel fast on your trail adventures with the Mountain Hardwear Mesa V2 shorts. Lightweight, durable nylon twill fabric has a crinkle finish that adds texture and gives the shorts an interesting look; fabric dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Hand pockets, rear pockets and a zippered thigh pocket secure your trail essential; zippered pocket includes a key clip. Mesh drain panels in the pockets come in handy for river crossings and spontaneous swims. Full-length inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Mountain Hardwear Mesa V2 shorts have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Pack light and travel fast on your trail adventures with the Mountain Hardwear Mesa V2 shorts.
